      • work

        public void work()
          throws Exception
        get a single row from the replicator and pass it to the producer or bootstrapper. This is the top-level function in the run-loop.

      • getLastHeartbeatRead

        public Long getLastHeartbeatRead()
        Get the last heartbeat that the replicator has processed. We pass along the value of the heartbeat to the producer inside the row map.
        指定者:
        getLastHeartbeatRead 在接口中 Replicator
        返回:
        the millisecond value ot the last heartbeat read

      • isMaxwellRow

        protected boolean isMaxwellRow(RowMap row)
        Is this RowMap an update to one of maxwell's own tables? If so we will often suppress the output.
        参数:
        row - The RowMap in question
        返回:
        whether the update is something maxwell itself generated

      • getRow

        public RowMap getRow()
              throws Exception
        The main entry point into the event reading loop. We maintain a buffer of events in a transaction, and each subsequent call to `getRow` can grab one from the buffer. If that buffer is empty, we'll go check the open-replicator buffer for rows to process. If that buffer is empty, we return null.
        指定者:
        getRow 在接口中 Replicator
        返回:
        either a RowMap or null
        抛出:
        Exception

      • setFilter

        public void setFilter(Filter filter)

        setFilter 在接口中 Replicator
